languages.text: {n}Эдельтрад тонко улыбается.{/n} "Леди Теодора, мне сложно понять ваше разочарование. Я с самого начала дал вам такой же — точнее, более развернутый и аргументированный — ответ. Заветы {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Бога-Императора{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Эдельтрад тонко улыбается.{/n} "Леди Теодора, мне сложно понять ваше разочарование. Я с самого начала дал вам такой же — точнее, более развернутый и аргументированный — ответ. Заветы {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Бога-Императора{/g}..."

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "Lady Theodora, your disappointment puzzles me. I gave you the same answer from the off, albeit in a more complete and compelling form. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets—"
languages.original_text: {n}Эдельтрад тонко улыбается.{/n} "Леди Теодора, мне сложно понять ваше разочарование. Я с самого начала дал вам такой же — точнее, более развернутый и аргументированный — ответ. Заветы {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Бога-Императора{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "Lady Theodora, your disappointment puzzles me. I gave you the same answer from the start, albeit in a more complete and compelling form. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets—"

{n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "Lady Theodora, your disappointment puzzles me. I gave you the same answer from the start, albeit in a more complete and compelling form. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets—"

{n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "Lady Theodora, your disappointment puzzles me. I gave you the same answer from the off, albeit in a more complete and compelling form. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets—"

{n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "Lady Theodora, your disappointment puzzles me. I gave you the same answer from the off, albeit in a more complete and compelling form. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets—"

{n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "Lady Theodora, your disappointment puzzles me. I gave you the same answer from the off, albeit in a more complete and compelling form. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets—"

languages.text: {n}艾德萨德淡淡地笑了。{/n}“西奥多拉夫人，您的失望令我大惑不解。我从一开始就给了您同样的答案，不过是以更加完整、更有说服力的形式。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}的信条——”
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "Lady Theodora, your disappointment puzzles me. I gave you the same answer from the off, albeit in a more complete and compelling form. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets—"

traits.locale_text: {n}艾德萨德淡淡地笑了。{/n}“西奥多拉夫人，您的失望令我大惑不解。我从一开始就给了您同样的答案，不过是以更加完整、更有说服力的形式。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}的信条——”

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad sonríe levemente.{/n} «Lady Theodora, su decepción me sorprende. Le di la misma respuesta, aunque de forma más completa y persuasiva. Según el dogma del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Dios Emperador{/g}...».
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "Lady Theodora, your disappointment puzzles me. I gave you the same answer from the off, albeit in a more complete and compelling form. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad sonríe levemente.{/n} «Lady Theodora, su decepción me sorprende. Le di la misma respuesta, aunque de forma más completa y persuasiva. Según el dogma del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Dios Emperador{/g}...».

languages.text: {n}エデルスラドは、かすかに微笑む。{/n}「シオドーラ様、あなたが失望されたことに私は困惑しています。私は最初からあなたに同じ答えをしてきましたが、より完全で説得力のある形で言い換えただけのことです。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}の教義は…」
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "Lady Theodora, your disappointment puzzles me. I gave you the same answer from the off, albeit in a more complete and compelling form. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets—"

traits.locale_text: {n}エデルスラドはかすかに微笑む。{/n}「レディ・テオドラ、あなたが失望されたことに私は困惑しています。私はあなたに最初から同じ答えをしてきましたが、より完全で説得力のある形で言い換えただけです。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}の教義は…」
{n}エデルスラドは、かすかに微笑む。{/n}「シオドーラ様、あなたが失望されたことに私は困惑しています。私は最初からあなたに同じ答えをしてきましたが、より完全で説得力のある形で言い換えただけのことです。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}の教義は…」

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad sourit légèrement.{/n} « Dame Théodora, votre déception me laisse perplexe. Je vous ai donné la même réponse d'emblée, bien que sous une forme plus détaillée et plus convaincante. La doctrine de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur-Dieu{/g}... »
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "Lady Theodora, your disappointment puzzles me. I gave you the same answer from the off, albeit in a more complete and compelling form. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad sourit légèrement.{/n} « Dame Théodora, votre déception me laisse perplexe. Je vous ai donné la même réponse d'emblée, bien que sous une forme plus détaillée et plus convaincante. La doctrine de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur-Dieu{/g}... »

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad lächelt schwach.{/n} "Lady Theodora, Eure Enttäuschung erstaunt mich. Ich habe Euch dieselbe Antwort gegeben, wenn auch vollständiger und überzeugender formuliert. Die Dogmen des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "Lady Theodora, your disappointment puzzles me. I gave you the same answer from the off, albeit in a more complete and compelling form. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad lächelt schwach.{/n} "Lady Theodora, Eure Enttäuschung erstaunt mich. Ich habe Euch dieselbe Antwort gegeben, wenn auch vollständiger und überzeugender formuliert. Die Dogmen des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} ..."

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad belli belirsiz gülümsüyor.{/n} "Leydi Theodora, hayal kırıklığınız beni şaşırtıyor. Daha en başında size aynı cevabı verdim. Gerçi daha eksiksiz ve ikna edici hâliyle. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Tanrı İmparator'un{/g} ilkeleri..."
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "Lady Theodora, your disappointment puzzles me. I gave you the same answer from the off, albeit in a more complete and compelling form. The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad belli belirsiz gülümsüyor.{/n} "Leydi Theodora, hayal kırıklığınız beni şaşırtıyor. Daha en başında size aynı cevabı verdim. Gerçi daha eksiksiz ve ikna edici hâliyle. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Tanrı İmparator{/g}'un ilkeleri..."

languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad smiles faintly.{/n} "Lady Theodora, your disappointment puzzles me. I gave you the same answer from the off, albeit in a more complete and compelling form. The God-Emperor's tenets—"
